name: B. Odd Swap Sort
statement:
You are given an array a_1, a_2,
dots, a_n. You can perform operations on the array. In each operation
you can choose an integer i (1
le i < n), and swap elements a_i and a_{i+1} of the array, if a_i +
a_{i+1} is odd.Determine whether it can be sorted in non-decreasing
order using this operation any number of times.
